title: Communal Flow States and Romance, Loving Your Enemies BoM Discord Q/A Aug 20, 2021
description:
Weekly Q/A on the Bridges of Meaning Discord Server, Fridays at 10am Pacific Time.

0:00:30  Sudden start
0:02:50  What’s PVK’s flow state?
0:27:25  Has PVK talked with Justin about a topic for the Unbelievable podcast?
0:31:20  What advise is there for parenting  after moving to a different country?
0:36:30  What should I do with my resentment?
0:52:30  PVK must wear his pastor collar (joke)
0:54:20  Does society have enough of supposed authenticity of wearing jeans?
0:56:15  What does PVK hope to find in a Amazon delivery from a rando?
0:59:25  Will people recognize the arrival of the mark of the beast?
1:06:40  What did Christine Hayes say about Jewish history?
1:08:40  Will John the baptist be the best man on Jesus’ wedding? (joke)
1:09:10  Book suggestion Gilead by Marilynne Robinson
1:11:40  What advise is there for someone to convince a local church to do estuary events?
1:13:45  Is Calvin more Augustinian than the pope?
1:17:25  What does prayer truly means? What’s more important: what I pray or how I pray
1:19:40  Is there a way we can set aside our prejudices and share agape?
1:24:15  Would it be different if Jesus was married and was he infatuated?
1:33:50  How to balance teaching kids and giving them their own room to grow?
1:41:50  Why do the ancient gods (eg. Greek, Mesopotamian) don’t have religions anymore?
1:46:55  Worship of the Watchers/Nephilim vs Bicameral mind
1:50:10  Can PVK give the link to Tom Holland and the Cuban substack?
1:51:45  Has PVK read Grand Erratum by Jean Baptiste Peres?
1:52:45  Intro rabbi Job
1:55:50  Has PVK listened to the course of the New Testament?
1:56:45  Job, heretic or not? Tom Holland on Judaism, Christianity and Islam.
1:58:45  Landing the plane
